TopicTitle: Would like help in creating a Kopernicus Planet

Articles.Content:
After creating a planet, Kopernicus didn't load my planet because of an exception.

Logs/Config below.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/osv4bjo9gv73bml/Debug.zip?dl=0

If you look in your KSP.log you can see

By the looks of things you misspelled referenceBody in your orbit node, spelling it "refrenceBody" instead.

For planet making, the Kopernicus Wiki (https://kopernicus.github.io/wiki/) is an excellent resource with detailed explanations of what different parts of the config file do. Using the wiki combined with the Log files will help you fix any errors in your code.
